p: The vaccination of RVF using RVF live attenuated vaccine (Smithburnâ€™s strains) and an inactivated vaccine, which gave partial protection, alteration between vaccination programs (between inactivated and live vaccine) [ 53], and uncontrolled field trials of RVFV live attenuated strain, resulted in contamination of the environment, further influence RVFV transmission [ 52, 54].
